targets.expr: + sum(netdata_apps_sockets_open_sockets_average{job=~"$node_id"}) by (job) + sum(netdata_users_sockets_open_sockets_average{job=~"$node_id"}) by (job) + sum(netdata_groups_sockets_open_sockets_average{job=~"$node_id"}) by (job) + sum(netdata_apps_pipes_open_pipes_average{job=~"$node_id"}) by (job) + sum(netdata_users_pipes_open_pipes_average{job=~"$node_id"}) by (job) + sum(netdata_groups_pipes_open_pipes_average{job=~"$node_id"}) by (job)
